text:
I’m interested in this conversation as well. Every time I try to pitch a brand campaign to my CEO, he always asks about the ROI of it in terms of leads which is kind of difficult to track and to perform because we are just focused on the awareness stage.

In our team we try to come up with a couple of set of metrics to try to analyze this kind of campaigns, so far we came up: brand search, direct traffic, conversation in social media.

I’d love to know your thoughts about it
